mapper.select: select a.id as "departid", a.name as "departname", a.countarticle as "countarticle" from ( select o.id, o.name, sum(b.count_article) as countarticle from ( select u.id,1 as count_article,u.office_id from ${str}.sys_user u,${str}.cms_article a,${str}.cms_category c where u.id=a.create_by and a.DEL_FLAG='0' and u.DEL_FLAG='0' and a.category_id=c.id and c.del_flag='0') b, sys_office o where o.id=b.office_id group by o.id, o.name order by countarticle desc ) a limit 5 offset 0
select office_id as "departid" , office_value as "departname", count_article as "countarticle" from cms_depart_contribution order by count_article desc
select office_id from cms_depart_contribution where office_id=#{departid}
select o.name from (SELECT PARENT_ID FROM SYS_OFFICE WHERE id=#{officeid}) p, sys_office o where o.id=p.PARENT_ID
